entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:36 PM CDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 2. POP 60%
